text: Please join us @Savyon Cafe this weekend (Saturday's vegetarian buffet 11:30-9 and Sunday's vegan buffet 11:30-4).
Savyon Cafe's Saturday vegetarian buffet tomorrow will feature a delicious vegetarian pizza! 6118 W. Pico LA 11:30-4PM
Savyon Cafe's buffet this weekend will feature veggie burekas! (Sat. 11:30-4 vegetarian buffet /Sun 11:30-4 vegan buffet),
Savyon Cafe - NEW Vegetarian all-you-can-eat buffet on Saturdays, 11:30-4 for $12.99.  Vegan buffet still on Sundays 11:30-4 for $10.99.
Savyon Cafe vegan buffet this Sunday, May 29, features some delicious new dishes and your favorites. 6118 W. Pico Los Angeles, CA
Tomorrow's Savyon Cafe vegan buffet will feature a delicious vegan chile,  vegetables in a light pepper sauce, baklava and many more dishes!
Savyon Cafe to have a special drawing for a free buffet meal on May 15th at the vegan buffet in honor of National Mediterranean Diet Month!
Did you know that May is National Mediterranean Diet Month? What a great month to try Savyon Cafe's Mediterranean vegan buffet on Sundays!
Savyon Cafe will have an delicious eggplant ratatouille, some new vegan paninis, and much more at the May 15, 2011 buffet! 11:30am-4pm.
Savyon Cafe (6118 W Pico/LA) - offering either a vegan baklava or another special dessert as part of this Sunday's vegan buffet for $10.99.
Savyon Cafe is still rated a perfect 5 stars on Yelp! http://alturl.com/k7dqw Thanks for your support! Join us on Sunday for Mom's Day!
Savyon Cafe Vegan Buffet all-you-can-eat! Sunday, May 1 11:30AM to 4PM. Please join us!
Savyon Cafe will be also adding a Thai theme to tomorrow's buffet! Pad Thai and a Thai Curry dish in addition to the other delicious dishes!
Savyon Cafe Sunday vegan buffet - price increasing to $10.99, but will include dessert starting May 8, 2011. Still $8.99 on Sun. May 1!
Thanks to those of you who joined us today at Savyon Cafe's vegan buffet! Next Sunday, May 1, there will be more new delicious dishes.
We have plenty of delicious vegan (mostly organic) Mediterranean food waiting for your right now at Savyon Cafe! 6118 West Pico Blvd. LA
Tomorrow is Easter, and Savyon Cafe's all-you-can-eat vegan buffet - 11:30AM to 4PM.  Most of the buffet ingredients are also organic!
Happy Earth Day!  We will be open tonight until 11PM.  Celebrate Earth Day with a delicious vegan dinner at Savyon Cafe!
Savyon Cafe has new hours! Mon-Sat.  5PM to 11PM, And Sun. 11:30AM-5PM (Vegan buffet 11:30AM to 4PM).
Savyon Cafe will add at least 3 new vegan panini sandwiches to the buffet this Sunday 11:30-4PM.  Matza will also be available.
Thanks for attending the Savyon Cafe Vegan Buffet today!  Savi is working on some different delicious dishes for next Sunday's vegan buffet.

text: Savyon Cafe will be having the all-you-can-eat vegan buffet this coming Sunday and every Sunday! $8.99  6118 W. Pico Blvd. in Los Angeles.
Thanks to those of you who came to our vegan buffet earlier! Our Facebook page is http://www.facebook.com/SavyonCafe
